senses.synonym: bastard: insulting terms of address for people who are stupid or irritating or ridiculous <i88330>

relations.target: Britain: a monarchy in northwestern Europe occupying most of the British Isles; divided into England and Scotland and Wales and Northern Ireland; `Great Britain' is often used loosely to refer to the United Kingdom <i83373>
